a.n: Archie Shepp - Stars In Your Eyes

p.k: Directed during the Jazz festival in Porquerolles 2010, the documentary focuses on the links and meeting point between saxophonist Archie Shepp and guitarist Marc Ribot.
p.d: Against the backdrop of the French Jazz a Porquerolles festival 2010, this documentary zooms in on the similarities between saxophonist Archie Shepp and guitarist Marc Ribot. For both Shepp and Ribot, music is a means of knowledge and resistance, and of self-construction; an exercise of freedom. Their meeting points are Albert Ayler, the blues, John Coltrane ... This exceptional meeting is a unique opportunity to dive into the heart of jazz to grasp the intimate movements of its history or the links between music and politics.
